```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r, fig.width=5}
library(RanchoStyle)
library(ggplot2)

p <- ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(formula = 'y ~ x', method = 'glm', se = F)+
  theme_minimal() 

p + scale_color_rancho() + 
  labs(title='main palette')
p + scale_color_rancho(palette = 'dark') + 
  labs(title='dark palette')
p + scale_color_rancho(reverse = T) +
  labs(title='reverse main palette')

rancho_palettes
as.list(rancho_colors)
```
